titleStmt.title: Prosopography: Wheaton Family Business and Financial Papers
titleStmt.author: Kathryn Tomasek

respStmt.resp: TEI-compatible XML created by Kathryn Tomasek with additions by John Burnet.
respStmt.name: Kathryn Tomasek
John Burnet

sourceDesc.p: Built from names mentioned in documents in the Wheaton Family Papers MC001, Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College.
The first forty-one entries are based on Paine's biography of Eliza Baylies Wheaton.

Entries 42 through 92 are based on on EBWdiaback file that was created by student researchers in 2005 and is used in Eliza Baylies Wheaton Diaries published in TAPAS. Entries 93 through 134 are also based on work of 2005 student researchers.
Entries 135 and following are names from Laban Morey Wheaton's Day Book.
The purpose of the new file is to bring supporting files for the Wheaton College Digital History Project into compatibility with TEI P5.
Begun by Kathryn Tomasek in April 2010.

monogr.author: Harriet E. Paine
monogr.title: The Life of Eliza Baylies Wheaton; a chapter in the history of the higher education of women, prepared for the alumnae of Wheaton Seminary

biblStruct.note: This is the source for the first forty-one entries in this prosopography.

monogr.author: George Faber Clark
monogr.title: A history of the town of Norton, Bristol County, Massachusetts, from 1669-1859

revisionDesc.change: 2014-05-14 Kathryn Tomasek changed numbering system to include three digits for each name identifier.
